org.apache.taverna.reference

Interface ReferenceServiceCacheProvider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SimpleCacheProviderImpl

    public interface ReferenceServiceCacheProvider
    A simple interface to be implemented by data access object cache providers, intended to be used to inject cache implementations through AoP
    Author:
    Tom Oinn

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Identified get(T2Reference id)
      Called before an attempt is made to retrieve an item from the backing store
      void put(Identified i)
      Called after an Identified has been written to the backing store, either for the first time or after modification.

    • Method Detail

      • put

        void put(Identified i)
        Called after an Identified has been written to the backing store, either for the first time or after modification. In our model ReferenceSet is the only Identified that is modifiable, specifically only by the addition of ExternalReferenceSPI instances to its reference set.
        Parameters:
        i - the Identified written to the backing store

      • get

        Identified get(T2Reference id)
        Called before an attempt is made to retrieve an item from the backing store
        Parameters:
        id - the T2Reference of the item to retrieve
        Returns:
        a cached item with matching T2Reference, or null if the cache does not contain that item
